wordpressPost.title: Sei A to play Klubben
wordpressPost.content:
Factory Floor has cancelled their gig tonight

 

Sei A is playing instead. He will also play Øyanatt at Sukkerbiten

Disclosure and Sei A at Sukkerbiten

 

Statement from Factory Floor:

“Due to album recording commitments Factory Floor are unable to make appearances at Way Out West and Oya festivals this summer. We apologise to all our followers in Norway and Sweden who were excited to see us for the first time and we intend to reschedule performances in the very near future.“

 

SEI A (UK)

The Scottish DJ and musician Sei A belongs to a new generation of British producers that ensure that the potent British bass culture merges with good old fashioned house music. Sei A has already released two albums (the last of them on Tigas Turbo label), as well as remixes for the M83, Booka Shade and Azari & III. He has also created a sensation by delivering bold edits of the Rolling Stones and Billie Holiday. Sei A’s DJ sets are synonymous with deep, melodic and very danceable music.

messages.newsletter.consentLabel: I agree to the terms and conditions
messages.newsletter.consentText:
Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via
    e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen
    lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du
    sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i
    nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding
    om at den ikke er aktiv.
